column5: Hello Everyone!It's good to hear that the fishing is picking up at Pine Falls and on the Red! I have been hearing a lot about crankbaits working very well! Has anyone had any luck with jigs? As far as bait go's..........whats been working minnows, frozen minnows, crawlers, leeches??thanks,Rye

When jigging, I have had equal success with Salted Minnows and Live Minnows the last 3 times I've been out to Pine Falls this September.At one time I used to swear it was Salted Minnows on Red River and Live Minnows at Pine Falls. My rule still holds true for the Red, but in the past couple of years I have done good with salted minnows at Pine Falls.

Rye,Cranks in any color. Depends on the day. #8&#9 Shad Raps, Deep Little Ripps, 24 bobmers, etc.Bottom Bouncers with crawlers & minnows. Big Blades.Jigs with minnows. Dont be affraid to bulk up w/ plastic.
